meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Johnson Dave Jeffery Peter Bedrossian Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1377.

td.p: Jim Johnson, an attorney from Des Moines, Iowa
Dave Jeffery, a political consultant from Fairfax, Virginia
Peter Bedrossian, an academic counselor from Poughkeepsie, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,800)

tr.td: MODERN HISTORY
CELEBRITY AUTOBIOGRAPHIES
DESIGN
OPERA
INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
WORDS WITHIN WORDS
(Alex: You must guard against giving too much information.)
